name: Handstand hold
description: Perform a freestanding handstand hold for the required time.

name: Regular pushup
description: Basic pushup: arms roughly shoulder width apart, let the elbows bend close to the body.

name: Pull up
description: From a still hang, pull with bent arms to raise chin over the bar/rings.

name: Plyo lunge
description: Jump into lunges on alternating legs, allowing your back knee to go as low as possible. One rep is a lunge on both legs.

name: Handstand hold
description: Perform a freestanding handstand hold for the required time.

name: Jump squat
description: A regular bodyweight squat with a jump at the top.

name: Glute bridge
description: Start lying on your back with your knees bent, feet flat on ground. Raise your hips, keeping your feet and shoulders on the floor.

name: Wall sit
description: 'Sit' leaning against a wall with legs bent at 90 degrees.

name: Skater jumps
description: Jump to the side, landing low on one leg, then jump the other way. Stay as low to the ground as possible.

name: C-crunch
description: Crunches with legs in table-top position: raised, bent at 90 degrees so that shins are parallel to the ground.

name: Leg raise
description: Lying on your back with straight legs, raise them to vertical and lower back down.

name: V-sit crunch
description: Start lying on your back with legs straight and arms straight by your ears. Raise your legs and torso at the same time, bending at the hips, to reach a V-sit position.
